nodes.text: Return of the Jedi Weekly was the fifth title of Marvel UK's Star Wars comic series. (The series' previous title was Star Wars Monthly.) The series reprinted stories from Marvel Comics' American Star Wars series, along with several original tales. The American comic's issues were usually split into smaller segments and appeared over a number of issues.
Unlike the previous titles -- which used a single numbering scheme -- this series' first issue was reset at #1.
